chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: The phone has a crack in the glass. Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The parcel is still at the pickup point, please inform the customer about it.

Regards,
KJ

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Falsches Produkt erhalten.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

We have received a phone with IMEI 356144898915943 while the phone the customer bought was with IMEI 356144894213228. It seems that the customer has returned the phone for order 40193703 instead. If the customer confirms they have returned the correct phone, please inform them to open an SAV for the correct order and to close this SAV.

Regards,
KJ

Dear Backcare,

The phone for this order has been returned to our warehouse. Does the customer prefer a refund or a reshipment?

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

refund

Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Refund done.

Regards,
RK
